appetizers.name: French Onion Soup
appetizers.description: French onion soup with Copper and Kings Brandy and Kenny's Kentucky Rose.

appetizers.name: Mussels
appetizers.description: Prince Edward Island mussels with roasted garlic and shallot, with fingerling chips.

cold sandwiches.description: Cucumber & Smoked Salmon Bagel with cream cheese dill, and capers.

hot sandwiches.description: Grilled Turkey and white cheddar sandwich on a grill sourdough bun.

desserts.description: Chocolate Creme Brulee with a sweet espresso candy topping

desserts.description: Pink fluffy macarons with edible flowers.
